author: wildwill
title: Still have all the parts
review: In some form or another - one of the first small sets I ever purchased.  I love mini-flyers and IIRC this was one of the first sets to include the control sticks.  The blaster was a great mod too.  I think I might even still have the instructions somewhere.  I hope so.

author: Mechatronic14
title: A Piece of History
review:
Although simplistic this classic space set is one of the smaller influences to what Lego space had become, or at least in my eyes. With the use of a piece previously unknown to me the build is actually fairly decent and having an original blue spaceman is perfect for any lego collection.

The only problems are; having to navigate around the different sites to find one of these for a decent price, some of these pieces are slightly more brittle then-new bricks, so they need to be handled with care. Lastly, the build is extremely short and easy so there isn't too much to experience.

Overall, I believe that this set is one of the easiest ways to give your collection a piece of history.
